author: Hocine Harzoune
title: Girondins de Bordeaux, la triste fin | Goal.com Fran√ßais
text:
Quelle triste fin pour un club mythique. Le passage de Bordeaux en appel devant la DNCG a abouti sur le redressement judiciaire du club et sa rel√©gation en National.
Le club a d'ailleurs revendiqu√© son envie d'√©voluer en National 1 lors de la campagne √† venir, via un communiqu√© officiel.
Bordeaux, la triste fin L'article continue ci-dessous "Suite √† la confirmation de la d√©cision de la DNCG de rel√©guer le FC Girondins de Bordeaux en National 1, le Club a, ce mardi, d√©pos√© le bilan aupr√®s du Tribunal de Commerce de Bordeaux, afin d‚Äôentamer la restructuration n√©cessaire. En cons√©quence, le Tribunal de Commerce prononcera, tr√®s prochainement, l‚Äôouverture d‚Äôune proc√©dure collective qui entra√Ænera automatiquement la perte du statut professionnel du Club."
La note du club ajoute : "D√®s lors, au vu des d√©lais tr√®s courts avant le d√©but de la saison de National 1, le Club a d√ª renoncer √† demander le maintien de son statut professionnel faute de quoi il aurait d√ª se pr√©senter √† nouveau devant la DNCG avec un budget ne correspondant pas √† la r√©alit√© √† venir du Club, ce qui aurait pu le conduire √† des sanctions suppl√©mentaires lourdes. C‚Äôest une d√©cision difficile qui anticipe une cons√©quence in√©luctable du processus de restructuration en cours. Si le centre de formation fermera en cons√©quence, le Club continuera √† promouvoir des √©quipes de jeunes."
Prochain match: Jeux d'amiti√© des clubs SCO GBO Pr√©sentation du match
Publicit√©

author: Sean English, WSBT 22 Reporter
title: chevron-right
text: BENTON HARBOR, Mich. (WSBT) ‚Äî Michigan's Attorney General released a report of alarming sexual misconduct allegations involving the Diocese of Kalamazoo. 19 priests across the 9 counties in Southwest Michigan are accused in the report including one former Benton Harbor Priest. This is the 3rd of 7 reports coming from the Attorney General's Office with these allegations dating all the way back to 1950. Jacob Vellian was born in 1934 and charged with 2 counts of rape in 2019 for an alleged assault that occurred in 1973. "You were trusted to our care.. and we failed to protect you," said Bishop Edward Lohse - Diocese of Kalamazoo. That was from a news conference earlier Monday releasing information about the allegations of sexual misconduct across Southwest Michigan, including one case involving a former Benton Harbor priest.. Jacob Vellian. The AG's report outlines the series of events. In 1973 a 15-year-old JANE DOE was a volunteer at St. John the Evangelist parish in Benton Harbor. A month after she started Vallian allegedly began to compliment her and rub her neck and shoulders. That then transitioned into inappropriate touching, Vallian reportedly saying he was "trying to fill her soul with the holy spirit," all before JANE DOE turned 16. In 1974, Vellian left the parish and the state of Michigan. Fast forward nearly 30 years later and JANE DOE reports the abuse to the Diocese of Kalamazoo. And then nearly 8 years later JANE DOE once again came forward, this time to a deacon of the church. In 2019, Vellian was charged with 2 counts of criminal sexual conduct and in 2023 while awaiting extradition Vellian likely died in India. St. John the Evangelist became Saints John and Bernard Parish in 1996 in Benton Harbor. Kalamazoo Bishop Lohse vowed to rewrite these past wrongs. "I know how deeply the clergy's sexual abuse crisis has shaken your faith. Betrayal by the people we were taught to trust and respect has caused a deep wound in our communities," said Bishop Edward Lohse - Diocese of Kalamazoo. The full report listed by AG Nessel is 144 pages long. You can read the full report below: This push for justice dates back to 2018. Although Vellian is believed to be dead his charges of alleged rape would be a maximum life sentence in prison.

title: High street giants facing shareholder revolt over low wages | Flipboard
text:
High street giants facing shareholder revolt over low wages Investor groups and City giants have teamed up to target high street giants Next, M&S and JD Sports with shareholder resolutions over their low wages. ‚Ä¶

author: La r√©daction avec AFP
title: Football. Angleterre : Battu par West Ham, Arsenal laisse sa place de leader √† Liverpool
text: Football Angleterre : Battu par West Ham, Arsenal laisse sa place de leader √† Liverpool Liverpool reste sur le tr√¥ne de la Premier League apr√®s la contre-performance de son d√©sormais dauphin, Arsenal, battu √† l'Emirates Stadium par West Ham (2-0) jeudi en conclusion d‚Äôune 19e journ√©e qui aura vu perdre trois des cinq √©quipes de t√™te. Cinq jours apr√®s avoir accroch√© les Reds √† Anfield Road (1-1), Arsenal a contre toute attente c√©d√© face √† l'√©quipe qui l'avait √©limin√©e de la Coupe de la Ligue d√©but novembre. Les Hammers ont donn√© raison √† l'analyse de leur entra√Æneur David Moyes, qui assurait avant le match que cette ann√©e √©tait la meilleure de l'histoire du club, avec notamment un triomphe en Ligue Europa Conf√©rence. Ils n'ont pas conc√©d√© la moindre occasion dans la premi√®re demi-heure de jeu, et m√™me marqu√© peu avant le quart d'heure apr√®s une mauvaise appr√©ciation de Gabriel Magalhaes, qui a profit√© √† Tomas Soucek (0-1, 13e). L'ancien d√©fenseur Lillois a √©galement perdu un duel a√©rien d√©cisif en seconde p√©riode face √† Konstantinos Mavropanos, suite √† un corner de Ward-Prowse (2-0, 55e). Un manque de r√©alisme c√¥t√© Gunners Souvent efficaces face au but depuis le d√©but de la saison, les Gunners ont cette fois manqu√© de r√©alisme avec Saka (30e, 42e), Martinelli (37e), Gabriel Jesus (66e) puis Trossard dans le dernier quart d'heure. Le score aurait pu √™tre plus cruel si Benrahma avait transform√© son penalty dans le temps additionnel. Les rentr√©es en jeu successives de Nketiah, Nelson et Smith Rowe ont rappel√© le manque de profondeur de banc √† disposition de Mikel Arteta. Arsenal compte deux points de retard sur Liverpool, alors que West Ham, 6e, est √† l'affut des places europ√©ennes, √† trois points de Tottenham et quatre points de Manchester City, vainqueur mardi √† Everton (3-1) et qui compte un match de plus √† disputer. Tottenham rechute lourdement Peu avant, Tottenham avait s√©v√®rement rechut√© sur le terrain de Brighton (4-2) et rat√© l'occasion de se rapprocher de la t√™te du championnat. Tottenham √©tait pourtant la meilleure √©quipe √† l'ext√©rieur avant cette rencontre et finit la premi√®re moiti√© de saison sur une note n√©gative, malgr√© une bonne cinqui√®me place au classement, √† un point de Manchester City. Meilleurs ces derni√®res semaines apr√®s un mois de novembre catastrophique sur le plan des r√©sultats, les Spurs ont montr√© un visage inhabituel avec beaucoup de passivit√©, comme sur cette action individuelle de Joao Pedro qui a pu passer en revue quatre joueurs et donner une balle en or √† Jack Hinshelwood, d√©marqu√© √† l'entr√©e de la surface de r√©paration (1-0, 11e). Entre plusieurs occasions nettes pour Brighton (17e, 32e, 45e), le m√™me Joao Pedro allait ensuite transformer deux p√©nalties (23e, 75e), avec entre-temps une frappe puissante de Pervis Estupinan dans la lucarne oppos√©e de Vicario (63e). Alejo Veliz (81e) et Ben Davies (85e) ont r√©duit le score, trop tard pour faire douter les Seagulls. Brighton se repositionne √† la huiti√®me place, √† six points de la premi√®re place europ√©enne.

author: Jaspal Singh
title: THCa Diamond distillate: Discover your paradise - SaveDelete
text:
In the developing hemp market, THCa is becoming more and more well-liked, drawing in both new and repeat consumers. Raw and living cannabis plants contain a combination of compounds called tetrahydrocannabinolic acid (THCA). It is the non-psychoactive form of THC‚Äôs precursor. Go to https://www.drganja.com/diamond-distillate-14g to see the range of products made from Diamond distillate.
Lowers the number of other chemicals while producing a product that is almost pure THCa.
The potency, adaptability, and rising interest in hemp have made THCa diamond distillate more and more well-liked. In this blog, we‚Äôll go over the unique qualities of THCa, the elaborate distillation process, and the reasons behind the current increase in demand for THCa diamond distillates.
What is THCa?
THCa is an innate event cannabinoid seen in cannabis plants. Unlike the well-known THC (tetrahydrocannabinol), THCa is not psychoactive. Therefore, it won‚Äôt get you ‚Äúhigh‚Äù like raw cannabis does. THCa and THC differ mainly from one another in terms of their molecular makeup and style of action.
A part process known as decarboxylation takes place. THCa is converted to THC by this device. This is the first stage that starts THCa‚Äôs psychoactive effects.
In its raw form, delta-9-THCa has some possible fitness benefits, such as anti-inflammatory and neuroprotective results. It is a vital part of the natural cannabis plant since it adds to the plant‚Äôs overall quality and acts as a sign of THC.
The process for Producing THCa Diamond Distillate
To create the pure, potent thing known as THCa distillate from raw cannabis, an exact process is followed.
Here is a careful break of the steps difficult in making THCa distillate:
Decarboxylation Winterization Distillation Extraction Temperature control is vital for the entire process, but especially for the decarboxylation and distillation phases.
The correct heat rule ensures that THCa is triggered without compromising the product‚Äôs quality, force, and purity.
Because of this careful concern in temperature, THCa distillate is very strong and pure. It is single on the market due to its high THCa focus, low other chemical content, and particular potency.
Benefits of THCa Diamond Distillate
THCa diamond distillate is not only really pure and potent, but it also provides a host of benefits to users and patients looking for exact healing and non-psychoactive effects.
The following are only a few advantages:
Benefits to Your Health One of the most vital aspects of THCa is its possible medical benefits. According to the study, THCa‚Äôs anti-inciting and anti-tumor effects make it a potential natural treatment for conditions like atonic, neurological disorders, and irritation-related issues.
Moreover, it can be used as a pain reliever and may potentially have growth-inhibiting properties that are being studied in link with cancer treatment.
Benefits of Psychoactivity For those who aim for the medical help of cannabis without any of the exciting side effects, THCa distillate may be the solution.
THCa does not make the same ‚Äúhigh‚Äù as THC unless heated, so customers can incorporate it into their routine without worrying about getting stoned. For those who must consume cannabis but still need to retain mental clarity, this function is helpful.
Give-in-use method Another crucial benefit of THCa diamond distillate is its compliance. It can be ingested, applied topically, or inhaled, among other methods. Because of its usefulness, users can choose the consuming technique that best suits their needs and preferences.
THCa can be used in various ways, such as nutrition for a slow-release effect, relevant creams for contained comfort, and breath for faster benefits. Due to its compliance, THCa distillate is edible and both healthy and fun for a broader range of users.
Techniques for Consuming THCa Diamond Distillate
THCa diamond distillate is helpful in a wide range of situations.
Here are a few of our favorites:
Dabbing Dabbing is a very potent way to consume THCa diamond distillate for those looking for quick effects. Take a tiny bit of distillate, melt it on a hot outside, and breathe in the gas.
Because dabbing offers control over overdosage and has a quick onset of effects, experienced users naturally favor it.
THCa Inclusion in Edibles Supplies containing THCa diamond distillate can be softly and ably ingested. By incorporating THCa distillate into recipes, users can enjoy its healing effects for longer.
Topical Uses for Convenient Relief The use of topical THCa diamond distillate reduces pain in specific body areas. You can apply THCa diamond distillate directly into your skin to achieve local interest during lotions, creams, and balms.
The Legal setting of THCa Diamond Distillate
Navigating the legal system can be testing because THCa diamond distillate has different legal statuses in other controls.
THCa diamond distillate falls into a gray area in certain situations because it is not psychotropic when not heated, unlike THC. This distinction is crucial in narrow support where rules divide cannabinoids resulting from hemp, such as CBDa, from those linked to moving effects, like THC.
Conclusion
THCa diamond distillate has been shown to have extraordinary possibilities in cannabis culture and medicine. This has led to increased interest in FDA regulation to ensure the safe and regular addition of THCa into the healthcare system.
Its future versatility to suit diverse needs is colored by many intake techniques, which range from topical treatments to dabbing. Looking ahead, there is a promising move towards everyday cannabis products due to the increased taking of and study into the medical benefits of THCa.
In reality, THCa distillate has changed the public view of cannabis, positioning it as a vital tool in balancing and option treatment. Its potent healing properties and non-exciting character have been known and valued by medical professionals as well as patients. People can explore a natural approach to well-being and take advantage of the plant‚Äôs many benefits without having to cope with the adverse effects of usual pharmaceuticals thanks to the potential of THCa distillate. As research on THCa distillate‚Äôs full range of health effects continues, it has the potential to totally change holistic therapy by creating new avenues for release and renewal.

author: Pablo S√°nchez
title: Estas personas ‚Äúnunca‚Äù podr√°n sacar una membres√≠a en Costco
text:
Estos ser√≠an los consumidores que no podr√≠an sacar una membres√≠a en Costco. Una empresa que tiene normas u reglamentos puede incrementar su productividad en un 13 por ciento, seg√∫n UNE. Las marcas tienen l√≠mites que son aclarados en sus pol√≠ticas de privacidad.
La cadena de tiendas al mayoreo Costco , se ha posicionado como una de las preferidas entre los mexicanos, ya sea por los pasteles, productos en tendencia y dem√°s, pero ha surgido un tema, en el cual se ha dejado al descubierto a las personas que no podr√≠an sacar nunca una membres√≠a en el negocio.
El proceso para obtener una de las tres membres√≠as de Costco es muy sencilla, s√≥lo se debe de asistir a una sucursal y solicitar el tr√°mite en el √°rea de membres√≠as, posteriormente pagar la cantidad de 500 pesos, en la Dorada y negocio, o mil 100 pesos para la ejecutiva.
Membres√≠as de Costco Recientemente, se trajo de vuelta el caso de un joven al cual se le habr√≠a negado el tr√°mite de la membres√≠a del Costco por su apellido , por lo que el joven relat√≥ su historia en redes, cuesti√≥n que en su momento llam√≥ la atenci√≥n.
De acuerdo a la versi√≥n del hombre, al tratar de sacar su membres√≠a en dicha tienda pero el personal del lugar le indic√≥ que esto no ser√≠a posible, debido a que su apellido era Pastor , el cual, seg√∫n ellos, estaba completamente prohibido para su ingreso a los negocios de Costco en todo el mundo.
Luego de que el hombre mencion√≥ lo relacionado, usuarios en redes sociales indicaron que este estaba mintiendo, por lo que indicaron que algunos de sus familiares tambi√©n tienen el mismo apellido y cuentan con una membres√≠a, por lo que se mostr√≥ de manera √∫nica e inesperada.
Esta situaci√≥n, que se present√≥ en su momento, hizo que los consumidores consideraran que era real, cuesti√≥n que llam√≥ la atenci√≥n de propios y extra√±os por el caso, a lo que investigando se encontr√≥ que no existe un impedimento por caracter√≠sticas personales para obtener la membres√≠a.
Supuestamente a este cabr√≥n le negaron la membresia de @Costco por apellidarse Pastor.
ü§£ü§£ü§£ü§£
Yo digo que es puro pedo pero.
¬øUstedes que opinan? pic.twitter.com/K5qeElQh11
‚Äî ‚ñï‚Éù‚É§‚Å©‚Å© Alquimista‚ñï‚Éù‚É§‚Å©‚Å© (@Librattus) May 11, 2024
Condiciones de marcas Las condiciones que las marcas imponen a los consumidores son un aspecto clave de la relaci√≥n comercial, influyendo en c√≥mo se percibe la marca y en la experiencia general del cliente.
Estas condiciones abarcan desde t√©rminos de servicio y pol√≠ticas de devoluci√≥n hasta restricciones sobre el uso de productos o servicios. Si bien son necesarias para proteger los intereses de las empresas, tambi√©n pueden afectar la satisfacci√≥n y lealtad de los consumidores si no se gestionan adecuadamente.
Una de las √°reas m√°s comunes en las que las marcas imponen condiciones es en los t√©rminos y condiciones de venta, que suelen incluir detalles sobre la garant√≠a de los productos, las pol√≠ticas de devoluci√≥n y reembolso, y las limitaciones de responsabilidad.
Estas condiciones est√°n dise√±adas para proteger a la empresa de posibles p√©rdidas y litigios, pero pueden ser vistas como restrictivas por los consumidores si no se comunican de manera clara y justa. Por ejemplo, pol√≠ticas de devoluci√≥n estrictas o complejas pueden disuadir a los clientes de hacer compras o generar frustraci√≥n si no se cumplen sus expectativas.
Otro aspecto es el uso de productos o servicios bajo licencias espec√≠ficas, donde las marcas pueden imponer restricciones sobre c√≥mo y d√≥nde se puede utilizar el producto.
Las marcas tambi√©n pueden imponer condiciones a trav√©s de programas de fidelizaci√≥n o membres√≠as, que ofrecen beneficios adicionales a los clientes, pero con ciertas condiciones, como la necesidad de alcanzar un umbral de gasto o la renovaci√≥n peri√≥dica de la suscripci√≥n.
Amazon Un ejemplo relevante es Amazon, que ofrece su servicio de membres√≠a Prime con numerosas ventajas, como env√≠os r√°pidos y acceso a contenido exclusivo.
Sin embargo, la suscripci√≥n a Prime incluye condiciones como la renovaci√≥n autom√°tica y el cobro de tarifas mensuales o anuales, lo que puede sorprender a algunos consumidores si no est√°n completamente al tanto de los t√©rminos.

author: VietNamNet News
title: Programme introduces reasons for Russian tourists to travel to Vietnam
text:
It was highlighted at the event that Vietnam is a safe tourist destination with many natural scenic spots, unique cultural values, friendly and hospitable people, world-class resorts, distinctive cultural festivals, affordable prices, fascinating local markets, and mysterious destinations for those who love to explore. Besides, the country is also a culinary paradise, and boasts the most beautiful bays in the world.
The event, organised by VNAT in coordination with the Vietnam Trade Office in Russia, was part of the activities in the 2024 Vietnamese Culture Days in Russia from July 1 ‚Äì 7. It attracted the participation of nearly 130 Russian businesses and Vietnamese firms operating in Russia.
Most businesses emphasised the necessity of resuming direct flights between the two countries, considering this one of the important factors for the rapid recovery and development of bilateral tourist flows.
Deputy General Director of VNAT Nguyen Le Phuc said the event marks an important milestone in strengthening tourism development cooperation, contributing to further strengthening the traditional friendship and cooperation between the two governments and peoples
Russia has always been one of the top source markets of tourists to Vietnam, with an increasing number of Russian holidaymakers choosing Vietnam as their destination, driven by their desire to explore a country with a rich history and a unique traditional culture.
Phuc said the programme is expected to contribute to restoring the influx of Russian tourists with large financial potential to Vietnam in the coming time.
Vyacheslav Manuilov, Deputy Head of the Department of Foreign Economic and International Relations of Moscow, said that Russian people are interested in Vietnamese cinema, language, and especially its renowned cuisine.
Vietnam‚Äôs events in Russia play a crucial role in advancing economic and cultural cooperation between the two countries, thus contributing to intensifying mutual understanding between their peoples, he stressed.
Representatives from Russia's largest airline, Aeroflot, showed their interest in the event as well as the Vietnamese tourism market, while introducing its new premium services and incentives that the airline is providing on its international routes./. VNA

persons.name: director of vnat nguyen le phuc

author: @universityofri
title: RhodyTHON raises more than $52,000 for Hasbro Children‚Äôs Hospital, a Children‚Äôs Miracle Network Hospital ‚Äì Rhody Today
text: KINGSTON, R.I. ‚Äî April 4, 2024 ‚Äì University of Rhode Island student volunteers danced the day away on a recent Sunday to benefit children with life-threatening and chronic illnesses. The volunteers and participants of RhodyTHON 2024 had much to celebrate at the conclusion of the dance marathon by raising more than $52,000 for Hasbro Children‚Äôs Hospital, a Children‚Äôs Miracle Network Hospital. RhodyTHON began at 10 a.m. and ended at 8 p.m. in Mackal Field House, during which participants enjoyed a variety of activities, games and performances from student organizations. Run by student volunteers, the event attracted more than 600 people, including 100 who registered that day. A moving and energetic day, the big reveal came at the end, when student organizers Grace Heppes and Gabrielle Pino, both URI seniors, unveiled the amount raised this year. ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs a feeling you get the day of the event that we talk about, us on the executive board and really anyone else who comes, and if you haven‚Äôt been there you won‚Äôt know what it‚Äôs like until you have,‚Äù says Heppes, of Otisville, New York, a clinical neuroscience major with minors in leadership studies and special populations. ‚ÄúIt is such a special and indescribable feeling. It is so rewarding to know how much of an impact we have made. It is a rare opportunity to make such a difference while having the time of your life.‚Äù Heppes and Pino, of Ewa Beach, Hawai‚Äôi, a double major in film media and communications, with a minor in general business, had been preparing for RhodyTHON since last years‚Äô event. As executive director and communications director, respectively, they are members of an executive board with 25 members. ‚ÄúThroughout the year, the RhodyTHON communications team worked toward creating infographics and videos to encourage members of the URI Community to register for Donor Drive until the main event,‚Äù Pino said. ‚ÄúKnowing the impact social media has on various communities, we were able to dedicate hourly posts for each Miracle Child to fundraise a certain amount based on their stories. During the main event, it was heartwarming to see everyone posting on their social media accounts to spread the love and joy RhodyTHON brings to the URI community.‚Äù Members of the organization undertook individual challenges during the year to raise money for the program. They also participated in group fundraising. Heppes did a push up for each dollar donation she received, while Pino accepted donations of $5 every time someone cracked an egg over her head. Heppes was inspired to get involved with Rhodython by her older sister, who founded another Miracle Network Dance Marathon fundraiser, ‚ÄúBomberTHON,‚Äù while attending Ithaca College in New York. When Heppes contacted the URI organization in October as a first-year student in 2020, there was just one position open on the RhodyTHON executive board. She describes the uncertain return of RhodyTHON after the COVID-19 pandemic, a period of time that influenced her entire URI experience, including her efforts to spread awareness and encourage the URI community and beyond to register for this event. Each of the 10 hours that made up RhodyTHON were devoted to an individual Miracle Child. At the top of each hour, choreographed ‚Äúmorale‚Äù dance performances kicked off the incoming series of dedicated activities. Dancers and children and their families enjoyed various crafts and snacks, all tailored to the interests of each Miracle Child during their hour. The Miracle Children and their families walked down a red carpet to begin their honorary time period. Mailboxes located near seats for the Miracle Children and their families allowed attendees to drop off letters of encouragement, praise and comfort. Apparatus from URI Emergency Medical Services and the Kingston Fire Department were available for children to explore outside the Mackal Field House. URI students recognized the familiar sight of URI Police Cpl. Paul Hanrahan serving up good, old-fashioned, hot dogs. One of the Miracle Kids set up a lemonade stand he built last summer to assist the fundraising effort. Those interested may still make a donation online . This story was written by Samantha Melia, a senior journalism and political science major at the University of Rhode Island and an intern in the Department of Marketing and Communications.
